text: University College Hospital (UCH) is a teaching hospital in London. It is the main building of the University College London Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust The hospital is closely associated with University College London (UCL). The hospital is on the south side of Euston Road in the Bloomsbury area of the London Borough of Camden. It is close to the main campus of University College. Category:Buildings and structures in the London Borough of Camden Category:University hospitals in the United Kingdom
title: University College Hospital
